1 歌に形はないけれど (Uta ni Katachi wa Nai Keredo)
</font>

<font size=4>
**doriko**'s second, and one of most notable works, a ballad about how songs do not fade with time. It is included on the album *unformed*.

[*reference*](http://vocaloid.wikia.com/wiki/%E6%AD%8C%E3%81%AB%E5%BD%A2%E3%81%AF%E3%81%AA%E3%81%84%E3%81%91%E3%82%8C%E3%81%A9_(Uta_ni_Katachi_wa_Nai_Keredo)#Japanese%20Lyrics)
</font>

<font face="Times New Roman" size=5>
2 愛はバラードのように～ベジータのテーマ～ (Ai wa Barādo no Yō ni~Bejīta no Tēma~)
</font>

<font size=4>
It is a character song for Vegeta performed by **Shin Oya**.

[*reference*](https://wiki2.org/en/Saiky%C3%B4_no_Fusion)
